message_text: @fields.child_nickname
@fields.child_nickname

It is completely normal to experience this challenge, and it can be difficult to know what to do at first. Next time try sitting with @fields.child_nickname and a book. Let @fields.child_nickname take the lead and follow their interest. You don't even need to read...just looking at the pictures together and talking about them works!

message_text: @fields.child_nickname
@fields.child_nickname

It is completely normal to experience this challenge, it can be difficult to get @fields.child_nickname's attention. Next time try letting @fields.child_nickname choose the book. It can even be a magazine or colouring the book. You don't even need to read...just looking at the pictures together and talking about them works!

It is completely normal to experience this challenge, it can be really difficult to find the time our busy lives. Can you think of a time during the day when you may be less busy, such as early in the morning or after dinner?  It will make a big difference in improving your relationship AND their learning abilities!
